sentences: Hyste'riah was formed by bassplayer J. B. Krown (from D.T.A.L.), drummer T. C. Hagen and guitarist Cliff T (later in Darkane and Terror 2000) at a local music festival in Landskrona.
Late in 1989, Hyste'riah joined forces with the remains of Helsingborg thrashers GOD.
In 2021 new recordings were done as a solo project by founder J. B. Krown and released as Badassery CD in 2022.
J. B. Krown – bass, vocals, drums (1987–1989), lead guitar (2021–present)
